channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Character Animator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Character Animator

item.title: CVE-2020-9586|2024-08-04T10:34:39.499Z -- adobe -- adobe%20character%20animator
item.description: Adobe Character Animator versions 3.2 and earlier have a buffer overflow vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-7870|2024-08-04T21:02:19.065Z -- adobe -- adobe%20character%20animator
item.description: Adobe Character Animator versions 2.1 and earlier have an insecure library loading (dll hijacking) vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
